org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.events

Class DispatchErrorEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.invocation.Event<EventType>
      • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.events.AbstractDispatchEvent<DispatchErrorEvent>
        • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.events.DispatchErrorEvent

  • public class DispatchErrorEvent
extends AbstractDispatchEvent<DispatchErrorEvent>
    Message within the dispatch stack representing a single error report. This may then be handled by upstream layers to retry jobs etc. If it reaches the top of the dispatch stack the behaviour is configurable but by default it will abort that workflow instance, being treated as a catastrophic unhandleable problem.
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.taverna.invocation.Event

      • popOwningProcess

        public DispatchErrorEvent popOwningProcess()
                                    throws ProcessIdentifierException
        Description copied from class: Event
        Return a copy of the event subclass with the last owning process removed from the owning process list. For example, if the event had owner 'foo:bar' this would return a duplicate event with owner 'foo'. If the owning process is the empty string this is invalid and will throw a ProcessIdentifierException
        Specified by:
        popOwningProcess in class Event<DispatchErrorEvent>
        Returns:
        a copy of the event with the parent process identifier
        Throws:
        ProcessIdentifierException

      • pushOwningProcess

        public DispatchErrorEvent pushOwningProcess(String localProcessName)
                                     throws ProcessIdentifierException
        Description copied from class: Event
        Return a copy of the event subclass with the specified local process name appended to the owning process identifier field. If the original owner was 'foo' and this was called with 'bar' you'd end up with a copy of the subclass with owner 'foo:bar'
        Specified by:
        pushOwningProcess in class Event<DispatchErrorEvent>
        Parameters:
        localProcessName - name to add
        Returns:
        the modified event
        Throws:
        ProcessIdentifierException - if the local process name contains the ':' character

      • getMessageType

        public DispatchMessageType getMessageType()
        Description copied from class: AbstractDispatchEvent
        Return the DispatchMessageType for this event object
        Specified by:
        getMessageType in class AbstractDispatchEvent<DispatchErrorEvent>
        Returns:
        Always a DispatchMessageType.ERROR
